Metadata.Description: The sword burns with enchanted fire when drawn from its sheath, inflicting an additional 1d6 points of damage with successful hits in combat. It can also be used as a light source with a 30 foot radius when unsheathed.

A dancing sword levitates to fight beside its owner without the need to be held. In the first round it is a +1 weapon, in the second round it is a +2 weapon, and in the third round it is a +3 weapon. After 3 rounds, the sword dances no further until it is directed at a new opponent, but remains a regular +1 sword regardless.
The sword detects traps as per the Clerical spell Find Traps.
The sword allows its wielder to see invisible objects.
The sword detects magic as per the Detect Magic spell.
The sword allows Clairaudience.
The sword allows the wielder to fly.
The sword allows the wielder to levitate, as per the Levitate spell.
The sword may be used to heal 1d6 hit points, once per day.
The sword imbues the wielder with the special abilities of a dwarf, when the sword is drawn.
The sword imbues the wielder with the special abilities of an elf, when the sword is drawn.
The sword may be used to cause Confusion to enemies once per day.
The sword has a 25% chance to deflect arrows before the to-hit roll.
The sword awakens its owner when danger is near, but only if the owner is asleep.
The sword detects the presence of a particular type or class of monster.
The sword detects Lawful or Chaotic alignments within 20 feet.

Metadata.Intelligence: Intelligent: communicates by telepathy to wielder only. Roll 3d6 for intelligence.
Metadata.Description: The sword allows its wielder to change his or her facial appearance and create the appearance of a slightly larger or smaller size, all by illusion.

Metadata.Intelligence: Intelligent: communicates by telepathy to anyone within 10 feet. Roll 3d6 for intelligence.
Metadata.Description: The sword may detect cursed items with a 50% chance of success.

Metadata.Intelligence: Intelligent: communicates by telepathy with wielder and can also speak aloud. Roll 3d6 for intelligence.
Metadata.Description: The sword allows the wielder to walk through 20 feet of solid rock, twice per day.

Metadata.Intelligence: Intelligent: communicates by telepathy to anyone within 10 feet, and can speak aloud. Roll 3d6 for intelligence.
Metadata.Description: The sword makes its wielder immune to all level-draining effects.
